name: @agence-adeliom/lando-adeliom
description: Automatically start and stop mutagen when starting and stopping a Lando project.

scripts.package: npm run clean && npm run compile && cp CHANGELOG.md dist && cp package.json dist && cp package-lock.json dist && cd dist && npm install --omit=dev --immutable --immutable-cache --check-cache
scripts.install:home: npm run compile && rm -rf ~/.lando/plugins/lando_adeliom && mkdir -p ~/.lando/plugins && cp -r dist ~/.lando/plugins/lando_adeliom
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:unit

author: Francois van der Ven (francois@vanderven.dev)
